reviewText: Bought for someone else so don't know lol

Greetings;

Well, I bought this without knowing anything about it, I mean, I am familiar with the series, but there was no information, no picture or anything to give me any indication as to how complete this item was. I mean that in the sense that this series has 3  volumes, that is to say, 3 half hour long episodes. I don't know for certain if every item that is listed here is the same, but speaking for what I bought, the dvd contained just volumes 1 and 2. Other websites offer the complete series for about $20 with shipping, found this out as I searched for volume 3. Volume 3 by itself, or even the three seperatly are not easily located, which has proven annoying. But at any rate, now I know. So do you for that matter. Soon enough I shall have the set, an extra pack of 1-2 now too. Thank you and take care...
